allow: Bash(bash -c 'LOGIN_RESPONSE=$(curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/v1/auth/wechat/login -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ""{\""code\"":\""test_user_atai\""}"") && TOKEN=$(echo $LOGIN_RESPONSE | python3 -c ""import sys, json; print(json.load(sys.stdin)[\""data\""][\""accessToken\""])"") && PERIOD_ID=""6915e741c4fbb40316417092"" && echo ""=== 期次的打卡记录（动态） ==="" && curl -s -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" ""http://localhost:3000/api/v1/checkins/period/$PERIOD_ID"" | python3 -m json.tool | head -120')
